design_philosophy.description: A minimal luxury site that feels like a bridal magazine. Generous whitespace, elegant serif typography, and gold accents. No clutter.

headings.usage: All section titles, hero headings, and card titles.

layout_strategies.spacing: Use p-24 or p-32 for section padding. Never use p-4 or p-8 for main sections.
layout_strategies.grid_system: Use the 'Tetris' grid for galleries. Mix 1x1, 1x2, and 2x2 aspect ratios.
layout_strategies.alignment: Center-align hero text for grandeur, but Left-align body content for readability.

buttons.primary: bg-[#1A1A1A] text-white hover:bg-[#333333] rounded-none px-8 py-6 uppercase tracking-widest text-xs transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-[#1A1A1A] text-[#1A1A1A] hover:bg-[#1A1A1A] hover:text-white rounded-none px-8 py-6 uppercase tracking-widest text-xs transition-all duration-300

cards.hover: zoom-in effect on image, text color shift

forms.input: border-b border-gray-300 focus:border-[#D4AF37] rounded-none bg-transparent px-0 py-4 placeholder:text-gray-400 focus:ring-0
forms.label: uppercase tracking-widest text-xs text-gray-500 mb-2

visual_enhancers.micro_interactions: Images scale up 1.05x on hover. Links have a sliding underline.
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise texture overlay on the background (opacity 0.03)
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Used only on the sticky nav: bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-white/20

tech_stack_instructions.icons: Lucide React (already installed). Use thin strokes (stroke-width={1.5}) for elegance.
tech_stack_instructions.fonts: Import Playfair Display and Manrope from Google Fonts in index.css
tech_stack_instructions.animations: Framer Motion for page transitions and scroll reveals.

universal_guidelines: Do NOT use standard Shadcn cards. Build custom layouts using pure HTML/Tailwind for the marketing pages.
Do NOT use gradients. Use solid colors or subtle textures.
Do NOT center everything. Use asymmetry to create interest.
Ensure all images have 'object-cover' and proper aspect ratios.
Use 'lenis' for smooth scrolling if possible, or just CSS 'scroll-behavior: smooth'.
